long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A Chrome extension that allows a user to join a Roll20 game as a Player by default.

This extension redirects the default request to the Roll20 Virtual Tabletop, adding params to ensure the user joins as a Player, rather than a GM, when entering a game they have GM permissions for. Then, you don't risk accidentally seeing the GM's notes when you join a game where you rotate between being a GM and a player!

If you want to switch to GM mode, you can do so once you've entered the game, and the extension will not redirect you.

The code for this extension is available on GitHub. Issues and pull requests welcome!
https://github.com/Mythos-Softworks/Roll20-Role-Selection
